message: Bob, I'm pleased to offer you a chance to own this unique product. I value it highly, but I'm open to a mutually beneficial agreement. To start the conversation, I propose a price of $1,800,000.
Alice, while I appreciate your offer, $1,800,000 is significantly higher than my budget.  To show my interest in the product, I'm willing to offer $1,200,000. Let's see if we can bridge the gap.

Bob, I appreciate your willingness to negotiate.  While $1,800,000 represents the premium value of this product, I recognize your perspective. I'm willing to come down to $1,600,000. This feels like a fair compromise.
Alice, I'm still interested in this product, but $1,600,000 remains a bit steep. I'm willing to go up to $1,400,000.  Let's keep working towards a mutually agreeable price.

Bob, I appreciate your efforts in this negotiation. It seems we both see significant value in this product. I'm prepared to move down slightly to $1,550,000. I believe this is a very fair offer considering its true worth.
Alice, while I see the value in this product, $1,550,000 is still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to go up to $1,450,000.  Let's meet in the middle and finalize this deal.
